11  RobotPanel::RobotPanel( QWidget* parent ) :
12  rviz::Panel( parent ),
13  m_ConnectButton(this),
14  m_EnableButton(this),
15  m_ReferenceButton(this),
16  m_ZeroButton(this),
17  m_OverrideSlider(Qt::Horizontal,this),
18  m_OverrideLabel(this),
19  m_OverrideSliderValid(false)
20  {
21  InitializeROS();
22  InitializeState();
23  InitializeUI();
24  }
25 
27  RobotPanel::~RobotPanel()
28  {
29  m_ControlButtonsLayout.setParent(nullptr);
30  m_JointsLayout.setParent(nullptr);
31  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
32  {
33  delete m_pJointControls[i];
34  }
35  delete[] m_pJointControls;
36  }
37 
39  void RobotPanel::InitializeUI()
40  {
41  m_ModelNameLabel.setText(m_ModelName.c_str());
42  m_MainLayout.addRow(tr("Model:"), &m_ModelNameLabel);
43  m_ControlButtonsLayout.addWidget(&m_ConnectButton);
44  m_ControlButtonsLayout.addWidget(&m_EnableButton);
45  m_ControlButtonsLayout.addWidget(&m_ReferenceButton);
46  m_ControlButtonsLayout.addWidget(&m_ZeroButton);
47  m_ReferenceButton.setText("Reference");
48  m_ZeroButton.setText("Set Zero");
49  double k=0.5*(double)m_CountJoints;
50  int rows=(int)round(k+0.5);
51  m_MainLayout.addRow(&m_ControlButtonsLayout);
52  m_MainLayout.addRow(tr("Override:"), &m_OverrideLabel);
53  m_OverrideSlider.setMinimum(0);
54  m_OverrideSlider.setMaximum(100);
55  m_OverrideSlider.setTickInterval(10);
56  m_OverrideSlider.setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksBelow);
57  m_MainLayout.addRow(&m_OverrideSlider);
58  m_pJointControls=new JointControl*[m_CountJoints];
59  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
60  {
61  m_pJointControls[i]=new JointControl(i,this);
62  m_JointsLayout.addWidget(m_pJointControls[i],i/2,i%2);
63  }
64  m_MainLayout.addRow(&m_JointsLayout);
65  setLayout(&m_MainLayout);
66  OnStatusFlagsChanged();
67  connect(&m_ConnectButton, &QAbstractButton::clicked, this, &RobotPanel::OnConnectButtonClicked);
68  connect(&m_EnableButton, &QAbstractButton::clicked, this, &RobotPanel::OnEnableButtonClicked);
69  connect(&m_ReferenceButton, &QAbstractButton::clicked, this, &RobotPanel::OnReferenceButtonClicked);
70  connect(&m_ZeroButton, &QAbstractButton::clicked, this, &RobotPanel::OnZeroButtonClicked);
71  connect(&m_OverrideSlider,&QAbstractSlider::valueChanged,this,&RobotPanel::OnOverrideSliderValueChanged);
72  }
73 
75  void RobotPanel::OnOverrideSliderValueChanged(int value)
76  {
77  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_OVERRIDE, 0.01*(double)m_OverrideSlider.value(),0);
78  }
79 
81  void RobotPanel::OnConnectButtonClicked(bool bChecked)
82  {
83  if(m_StatusFlags&cpr_robot::Robot::STATUSFLAG_DISCONNECTED)
84  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_CONNECT, 0.0, 0);
85  else
86  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_DISCONNECT, 0.0, 0);
87  }
88 
90  void RobotPanel::OnReferenceButtonClicked(bool bChecked)
91  {
92  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_STARTREFERENCING, 0.0, 0);
93  }
94 
96  void RobotPanel::OnZeroButtonClicked(bool bChecked)
97  {
98  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_SETZERO, 0.0, 0);
99  }
100 
102  void RobotPanel::OnEnableButtonClicked(bool bChecked)
103  {
104  if(m_StatusFlags&cpr_robot::MotorModule::STATUSFLAG_MASK_ANY_ERROR)
105  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_ENABLE, 0.0, 0);
106  else
107  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_DISABLE, 0.0, 0);
108  }
109 
111  void RobotPanel::InitializeState()
112  {
113  cpr_robot::GetRobotInfoResponse rbtInfo=GetRobotInfo();
114  m_CountJoints=rbtInfo.CountJoints;
115  m_ModelName=rbtInfo.Model;
116  m_StatusFlags=cpr_robot::Robot::STATUSFLAG_DISCONNECTED;
117  }
118 
120  void RobotPanel::InitializeROS()
121  {
122  m_GetRobotInfoClient=m_Node.serviceClient<cpr_robot::GetRobotInfo>("/GetRobotInfo");
123  m_RobotStateSubscriber=m_Node.subscribe("/robot_state",10,&RobotPanel::RobotStateCallback, this);
124  m_RobotCommandClient= m_Node.serviceClient<cpr_robot::RobotCommand>("/RobotCommand");
125  }
126 
129  void RobotPanel::RobotStateCallback(const cpr_robot::RobotState::ConstPtr& msg)
130  {
131  if(m_StatusFlags!=msg->StatusFlags)
132  {
133  m_StatusFlags=msg->StatusFlags;
134  OnStatusFlagsChanged();
135  }
136  if(m_Override!=msg->Override)
137  {
138  m_Override=msg->Override;
139  OnOverrideChanged();
140  }
141  if(!m_OverrideSliderValid)
142  {
143  if((m_StatusFlags&0xffff)==0x0000)
144  {
145  m_OverrideSlider.setEnabled(true);
146  m_OverrideSlider.setValue((int)(100.0*m_Override));
147  m_OverrideSliderValid=true;
148  }
149  }
150  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
151  {
152  if(msg->StatusFlags&(((uint32_t)1)<<(16+i)))
153  m_pJointControls[i]->set_IsReferenced(true);
154  else
155  m_pJointControls[i]->set_IsReferenced(false);
156  }
157  }
158 
160  void RobotPanel::OnOverrideChanged()
161  {
162  std::stringstream sstr;
163  sstr << ::std::fixed << std::setprecision(1) << 100.0*m_Override << " %";
164  m_OverrideLabel.setText(sstr.str().c_str());
165  }
166 
168  void RobotPanel::OnStatusFlagsChanged()
169  {
170  if(m_StatusFlags&cpr_robot::Robot::STATUSFLAG_DISCONNECTED)
171  {
172  m_ConnectButton.setText(tr("Connect"));
173  m_EnableButton.setEnabled(false);
174  m_OverrideSlider.setEnabled(false);
175  m_ReferenceButton.setEnabled(false);
176  m_EnableButton.setText(tr("Enable"));
177  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
178  m_pJointControls[i]->Disable();
179  }
180  else
181  {
182  m_ConnectButton.setText(tr("Disconnect"));
183  m_EnableButton.setEnabled(true);
184  m_OverrideSlider.setEnabled(false);
185  if(m_StatusFlags&cpr_robot::MotorModule::STATUSFLAG_MASK_ANY_ERROR)
186  {
187  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
188  m_pJointControls[i]->Disable();
189  m_EnableButton.setText(tr("Enable"));
190  m_ReferenceButton.setEnabled(false);
191  }
192  else
193  {
194  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
195  m_pJointControls[i]->Enable();
196  m_EnableButton.setText(tr("Disable"));
197  m_ReferenceButton.setEnabled(true);
198  }
199  }
200  m_OverrideSliderValid=false;
201  }
202 
204  cpr_robot::GetRobotInfoResponse RobotPanel::GetRobotInfo()
205  {
206  cpr_robot::GetRobotInfo srv;
207  srv.request.Sender="cpr_robot::RobotPanel";
208  if (m_GetRobotInfoClient.call(srv))
209  {
210  ROS_INFO("GetRobotInfo: model %s, %ui joints.",srv.response.Model.c_str(),srv.response.CountJoints);
211  }
212  else
213  {
214  ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service GetRobotInfo.");
215  srv.response.Model="Unknown Robot";
216  srv.response.CountJoints=0;
217  }
218  return srv.response;
219  }
220 
225  cpr_robot::RobotCommandResponse RobotPanel::RobotCommand(const uint32_t commandId, const double payloadFloat, const int64_t payloadInt)
226  {
227  cpr_robot::RobotCommand srv;
228  srv.request.Sender="cpr_robot::RobotPanel";
229  srv.request.CommandId=commandId;
230  srv.request.PayloadFloat=payloadFloat;
231  srv.request.PayloadInt=payloadInt;
232  if (!m_RobotCommandClient.call(srv))
233  {
234  ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service RobotCommand.");
235  }
236  return srv.response;
237  }
